Package tage

Class CameraOrbit3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • tage.CameraOrbit3D
  • public class CameraOrbit3D
extends java.lang.Object
    A CameraOrbit3D class. This class orbits the camera around the avatar. It has fields for the engine, a camera, a GameObject, the orbit around the GameObject, the camera's elevation, and the distance from the GameObject. It has a constructor a function to set up inputs, and update the camera position. It has private classes to help with the movement of the camera.
